title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook

title: Voice Winner Adam David Tells All About His Bromance With Michael Bublé and Inspiring Comeback
description: The odds were stacked high against Adam David. In The Voice’s Season 27 Semifinals, he had to sing for the Wildcard Instant Save — not a great omen moving into the Top 5. But Team Michael Bublé’s MVP just kept doing what he does — performing with as much feeling as consistency — and gave […]
author: Charlie Mason

title: Save the Dates: Mariska Hargitay’s Documentary, Noah’s Arc: The Movie and More
description: Mariska Hargitay will shine the spotlight on her mother, actress Jayne Mansfield, in the documentary My Mom Jayne, premiering Friday, June 27 at 8/7c on HBO. “Mariska Hargitay was three years old when her mother, Jayne Mansfield, tragically died in a car accident at the age of 34,” reads the official description. “The film follows […]
author: Vlada Gelman
